data.question: What is the chemical formula of Th6-Me2BPDC-NO3-10?
At what temperature (K) were the X-ray intensity data for Th6-Me2BPDC-8b collected?
What is the space group of U6-Me2BPDC-TFA-10?
What is the crystal system of Th6-Me2BPDC-10-MeOH?
What is the largest residual electron density peak for Th6-Me2BPDC(Me2TPDC)-12?
Is Th6-Me2BPDC-8 stable in water?
data.answer: Yes, Th6-Me2BPDC-8 remained stable in water for three months.

data.question: Does the Th6-Me2BPDC-NO3-10 structure undergo a phase transition when immersed in water?
data.answer: Yes, Th6-Me2BPDC-NO3-10 undergoes a phase transition when immersed in water.

data.question: Can Th6-Me2BPDC-8 undergo more than three cycles of crystallinity restoration?
data.answer: Yes, Th6-Me2BPDC-8 can undergo more than three cycles of crystallinity restoration.

data.question: What is the percentage of linker installation for Th6-Me2BPDC(Me2TPDC)-12 calculated from 1H NMR studies?
Does the Th6-Me2BPDC-NO3-10 structure change after exposure to methanol?
data.answer: Yes, the Th6-Me2BPDC-NO3-10 structure changes after exposure to methanol.
